moves.2. Nf3 Nc6 3. Bb5: The Ruy Lopez,the most popular opening against the king pawn defense
moves.3... Nf6: The berlin.I never have been fond of the main line 3...a6.
moves.6. dxe5: White deviates.The main line is 6.Bxc6 dxc6 7.dxe5 Nf5 8.Qxd8+ Kxd8,the line in which Kramnik took down kasparov in the 2000 world chess championship.
moves.7... Nbd4 8. Nxd4 Nxd4 9. Qxd4 d5: Opening the lines for the LSB
moves.10. exd6 e.p. Qxd6: Offering a trade of queens,going into the endgame when the two bishops are better.The reason the line is not popular is because it gives up the two bishops,and Black can still castle!Something he cannot do in the main line.
moves.13. Re1+ Be6 14. Qe4: Side stepping around the trade again.
moves.15. Qe5: For the last time I don't want to trade!
moves.18. Ra4 Rfe8: going to challenge the file in case of 19.Rae4

opening: Ruy Lopez (C67), open Berlin defence, l'Hermet variation
